lines: Your starter Pokémon holds incredible potential.

pages.speaker: professor
lines: Your starter can evolve and become even stronger.
To unlock its true potential, you need to train diligently.

pages.speaker: professor
lines: That's the spirit! Training is key to evolving your Pokémon.
Battle wild Pokémon and gain experience.

pages.speaker: professor
lines: Start by defeating some wild Pokémon to strengthen your starter.

pages.speaker: professor
lines: Remember, your starter gains experience from battles.

Keep pushing forward, and you'll witness its evolution soon!

pages.speaker: professor
lines: I have high hopes for you and your Pokémon.

lines.expression: 'I have high hopes for you and your Pokémon. Good luck on your journey, ' + q.player.username + '!'
